catalog_info.title: Proseminar on Inequality and Social Policy II
catalog_info.notes: Also taught by David Deming (HGSE) Offered jointly with the Kennedy School as SUP 922.  Offered jointly with the Kennedy School as SUP 922. For 2014-15, FAS offers this course as Government 2340b.
catalog_info.description: Deals with causes and possible cures for economic inequality, including skill differences, discrimination, immigration, household composition, residential segregation, and the welfare state.
